interfaces.description: Object containing a list of interfaces for a router or switch

poe_status.description: Status of POE on an interface

vlans_available.description: list of vlans available on a device

wirelessaccesspoints.description: A collection of wireless access points

vlans.description: list of vlans on an interface

interface_detail.description: Detailed information about a switch interface

vlans_interface.description: Lists of tagged and untagged vlans

modules.description: A list of modules for a router/switch

enabled.description: Boolean indicating whether or not a resource is enabled
enabled.name: request body

freeze_post.description: POST body for a new Soft freeze rule. 'building' is the only required field (see /buildings for a list of valid building abbreviations). If 'start_time' is omitted or is null, the rule will take effect immediately. If 'end_time' is ommitted or is null, it will remain in effect until a DELETE request is received on /freezes/{id}
freeze_post.name: request body

untagged_vlan.description: Request body to set untagged vlan. 'vlan' is the only required field. If 'start_time' is defined, the change will be made at that time. If 'end_time' is defined, the untagged vlan at the time of the change will be restored at the specified time
untagged_vlan.name: request body

end_time.description: Query end time relative to now. Should be an integer followed by 'd', 'h', 'm', or 's' (days, hours, minutes, or seconds). For example, if start_time is '1d' and end_time is '3h', the query will range from 1 day ago to 3 hours ago.
end_time.name: end_time

resource_record_data.description: IP address or hostname that is pointed to by another hostname
resource_record_data.name: data

start_time.description: Query start time relative to now. Should be an integer followed by 'd', 'h', 'm', or 's' (days, hours, minutes, or seconds). For example, if start_time is '1d' and end_time is '3h', the query will range from 1 day ago to 3 hours ago.
start_time.name: start_time
